meanings.definition: A bag with shoulder straps for carrying items on one's back.
meanings.sent1: I always take my backpack to school.
meanings.sent2: She packed her lunch in her backpack.
meanings.sent3: The backpack looked like a turtle shell on his back.
meanings.sent4: Her backpack was a trusty companion on all her adventures.
meanings.sent5: The colorful backpack stood out in the sea of students.

meanings.definition: To carry items in a backpack.
meanings.sent1: I backpacked all my books for the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: They decided to backpack their supplies for the hike.
meanings.sent3: He tried to backpack his dog, but it was too heavy.
meanings.sent4: She backpacked her memories wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: Backpacking the essentials made the journey easier.
